text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE
DIVISION OF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION
BOX 8-450, UNIVERSITY STATION
KNOXVILLE
R c c r; veq
radio station
RADIO AND TELEVISION SERVICES
RADIO STATION WUOT
September 15, 1955
IS 8 *j Ail |S55
Mr. Prank Schooley
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Dear Prank:
I’m sending a page for the next Newsletter early this
time. Again my apologies for missing last issue; I’m sure
it won’t happen again. I’m very interested in the de Tocque-
ville scripts since I've read them; what should the next
step be? Are we to submit some program suggestions as a
subcommittee, as individuals, or just what would you prefer?
Things are damn hectic here with new studio and transmitter
construction. We're really building a new PM station, going
from 3400 to 80,000 watts if the free equipment we've received
can be adapted. But with more staff now, I think I can devote
some time to program planning once I understand what procedure
to follow.
^Kln Wr
Sincere regards
9
n Wright
KW:ss
